name: roomstash

scripts.mkdirs: npx mkdirp public/dist/css/ && npx mkdirp public/dist/js/
scripts.concat:css: npx concat -o public/dist/css/keybase.css public/css/tailwind.css public/vendor/nouislider/nouislider.css public/vendor/fontawesome/css/all.css public/vendor/owlcarousel/owl.carousel.css public/vendor/owlcarousel/owl.carousel.css public/css/custom.css
scripts.concat:js: npx concat -o public/dist/js/keybase.js public/js/wNumb.js public/vendor/nouislider/nouislider.js public/vendor/owlcarousel/owl.carousel.js public/js/global.js public/js/layouts_auth.js public/js/layouts_dashboard.js public/js/layouts_main.js public/js/nouislider_config.js public/js/owlcarousel_config.js
scripts.build:css: npm run tailwind && npm run concat:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run minify:js
scripts.build: npm run mkdirs && npx npm-run-all --parallel build:*
scripts.install-pkgs: npm install autoprefixer bcryptjs body-parser cloudinary connect-flash connect-mongo cookie-parser crypto csurf dotenv express express-handlebars express-logger express-session express-validator file-system helmet mongoose morgan multer nodemailer paystack postcss serve-favicon tailwindcss wnumb --save
scripts.install-dev: npm install concat mkdirp nodemon npm-run-all uglify-js --save-dev

author: Jeffrey Onuigbo
description: Stashroom - A platform for finding and booking places to stay in school =========
